subject: Softball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Lisa Fernandez, a three-time Olympic champion and perhaps softball’s biggest star for more than a decade, did not make the United States team’s final 15-player roster for the Beijing Games. “It’s like Michael Jordan getting cut from the basketball team,” catcher Stacey Nuveman said. Fernandez, 37, was named as a replacement player on the team, which will try to win its fourth straight gold medal this summer.
